import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react" import { addItem } from "../Services/allAPI" function Home() { const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) const base_url = "https://dummyjson.com/products" const fetchData = async () => { const result = await fetch(base_url) .then((res) => res.json()) .then((products) => setProduct(products.products)) } console.log("product data...result", product) useEffect(() => { fetchData() }, []) // const [product,setProduct] = useState({ // id:"", // title:"", // price:"" // }) // const handleAddItem = async()=>{ // const {id,title,price} = product // // make api call // const response = await addItem(product) // console.log(response); // } return ( <>
